forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Downtown San Francisco awakens to a day of gentle sunlight, dappled with soft clouds creating an inviting ambiance. The temperature is set to peak at a refreshing 62 degrees, accompanied by a playful west-southwest wind that dances in at 10 to 18 mph. Today’s offerings are tempered by the historical embrace of the city’s famous marine layer, hinting at a delicate veil of fog that caresses the coastline, particularly around the Golden Gate. This adds a touch of mystery and romance to your strolls, while temperatures linger comfortably in the cool embrace of the coastal air.

As the daylight progresses into the evening, the ambiance deepens with partly cloudy skies giving rise to the rich tapestry of colors as dusk approaches. Expect the temperature to dip around 52 degrees, inviting one to wrap up in layers—a light jacket or a cozy sweater may provide that necessary comfort against the cool evening breeze. With these conditions, a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, perhaps with a warm cup of coffee in hand, or a quiet moment spent in one of the neighborhood parks, seems fitting. Such activities resonate with the serene rhythm of the city, providing solace in its gentle embrace.
